channel.title: Funerals on Gerard McGarry
channel.description: Recent content in Funerals on Gerard McGarry

item.title: The Funeral
item.description: Rewind to two days before the funeral, his green Nissan Primera racing toward Ballycastle for the final time. But he’s not at the wheel, I’m the driver, my newly widowed mother beside me, still shell-shocked. Sister in the back seat, silent.
